data.eml:eml: A new species of Euchalcia Hübner, [1821] from Kazakhstan (Lepidoptera, Noctuidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Volynkin, Anton V., Titov, Sergey V., Ivanova, Maria S. (2014): A new species of Euchalcia Hübner, [1821] from Kazakhstan (Lepidoptera, Noctuidae). Zootaxa 3784 (4): 493-497, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3784.4.8
